Email.subject: Welcome to ExamCrazy.Com
Email.body:
Dear $$UserName$$

Thank you for registering with ExamCrazy.Com

We welcome you to ExamCrazy.Com family.

Please note you are bound by the $$TandCLink$$ of this website. In case of any issue please contact support@examcrazy.com

Please verify your email by clicking on $$EmailVerify$$

Kind regards,

ExamCrazy.com
